General.Name: Inbar Group Finance Ltd
General.Description: Inbar Group Finance Ltd provides proprietary trading and distribution consulting services in Israel and internationally. The company trades in share indices; and invests in securities, including shares, corporate and government bonds, and other financial assets, as well as provides consulting and distribution services. It is also involved in the initiation and execution of private loans from various institutional entities and investment funds to a range of public and private companies in various fields. The company was formerly known as Itay Financial A.A Investments Ltd and changed its name to Inbar Group Finance Ltd in February 2018. Inbar Group Finance Ltd was founded in 1980 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

1.Name: Mr. Moshe  Shmueli
1.Title: VP of Risk Management & Compliance Officer
